verbs.description: [ARG1: Hollywood heavyweight Jon Voight] [V: came] out [ARG2: swinging on social media against fellow thespian legend Robert De Niro for his diatribe against Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump] .

[ARG0: Hollywood heavyweight Jon Voight] came out [V: swinging] [ARGM-LOC: on social media] [ARG1: against fellow thespian legend Robert De Niro] [ARGM-CAU: for his diatribe against Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump] .
